EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-12-DXC Executive Partnership Update.December 2017 Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic and DXC Executive Partnership Update 12.15.2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
This is the pilot for a weekly partner update we want to distribute going forward. The objective is to keep all stakeholders within DXC up to date on key metrics across the partnership.
We look forward to providing this update every Friday, and encourage your feedback on this initial installment. Any questions or comments please let me know.
Thanks,
Greg
